attributes.action: Lower the legal drinking age to 12
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Bring the UK into line with most of the continent. Starting people earlier on alcohol will make it less of an attraction to the middle-to-late teens, hopefully reducing the anti-social binge drinking we have now. Drunk 12 year olds are less likely to cause bother then drunk 18 year olds.
